cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: many fleas, but unconcerned (idiom); no point in worrying about one debt when one has so many others, Troubles never come singly., It never rains but it pours.
